name: Zombies Kill
description:
Fight off endless waves of zombies. Compete for a high score. This was made in about 12 hours. Currently 3 different guns. More features to be added over time depending on the level of interest. 

Controls: The player is always facing the mouse. WASD to move, left mouse to fire primary weapon. Space bar to detonate a grenade that will clear all enemies.

Press enter to start
